title: Research Project in Forensic Science
description:
This is a compulsory project-based module for students taking the M.Sc. in Forensic Science programme. Students will conduct research on topics related to forensic science, under the supervision of a faculty member and/or co-supervisors
with our industry partners. Through this independent project, students will gain hands-on practical knowledge in solving forensic science related problems using scientific techniques. The project is concluded with a written report and oral
presentation.
